expression.Value: Types of expressions that are not executed by a remote server
The following types of expressions are never executed in a remote server:
Expression for file operations, such as creating, deleting, copying, linking, reading or writing files on the server.
Expressions that perform communications with another computers, such as sending e-mails, transferring files by FTP protocol, opening SSH connectiosn, etc.
Expressions for user interaction, such as showing dialog boxes, requesting user input, etc.
